name: PAC-MAN Party
description:
Join PAC-MAN and his friends in a funtastic adventure battling for
cookies in a brand new party game! There're 5 exciting worlds, over 50
mini-games and everyone takes their turn simultaneously so there's more
playing and less waiting! The original PAC-MAN, Galaga and Dig-Dug
arcade games are included so even old-school Pac-fans can get their game
on!

Features

• Control PAC-MAN in Story Mode and meet new friends
• Over 50
fun and exciting mini-games to play
• Classic Arcade Games PAC-MAN,
Galaga + Dig-Dug included
• Battle in Party Mode with a board game
style adventure
